item.title: 【HD Live Performances】UPSCALE - Whitney Houston - Good Morning America [Dec-10-2002] 1080p Remastered MPA2.0 HEVC-MELODiE

Whitney Houston - Good Morning America [Dec-10-2002] 1080p Remastered MPA2.0 HEVC-MELODiE




My old attempts to make something good out of what I have, it seems to me that I killed the color scheme, but I like the picture

My video but stretched to 4K so it looks decent on YouTube
